About Me

I am a developer and I have experience with QA, Java, Javascript and node. To build this website I've used bootstrap and other things along with web development I will also include my opinion on other things such as my favorite albums. Beginner guides to using things like express and gulp to help people like me trying to gain a understanding of technologies used everyday boy all sorts of employers.
